title: Add @since javadoc tags to the URP classes
description:
Continuing work started in SOLR-11490, add @since javadoc tags to all descendants of UpdateRequestProcessorFactory.

Most of them have been tagged already, just SignatureUpdateProcessorFactory to be marked as 3.1 and new OpenNLPLangDetectUpdateProcessorFactory as 7.3.0
